adjectives.description: stoked (comparative more stoked, superlative most stoked)

entries.meaning: (slang) Feeling excitement or an exciting rush.
examples: When you're driving hard and fast down the wall, with the soup curling behind yer, or doing this backside turn on a big one about to tube, it's just this feeling. Yer know, it leaves yer feeling stoked.

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of stoke
